casebody.data:
2002-1905 (La. 10/25/02)

SAVANT INSURANCE SERVICES, INC. and Savant Insurance Company v. CENTRAL OIL AND SUPPLY CORPORATION. No. 2002-C-1905. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Central Oil & Supply Corp.;— Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiora-ri and/or Review, Parish of Ouachita, 4th Judicial District Court Div. A, No. 97-1612; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, No. 36095-CA.

Denied.
